page.title: 04Gravenhurst introduction
page.content: The majority of people living here have to travel out of the village to work. A few are employed on the local farms and at the National Institute of Agricultural Engineering, but others commute as far as London. The residents of Gravenhurst have an enormous variety of jobs eg Brittania Airways pilot, Sainsbury'Manager, Gamekeeper, Geologist, Air Traffic Controller, Teachers, Farm Labourers, Builders, Illustrator, Doctor, Decorators, and Mobile Greengrocer.There are only two industries in the village. "Kentone Plastics Ltd" This is a family business in the manufacturing of small plastic injection moulded components, for various industries such as, Electronic, Farming, Furniture, Car, Medical and Surgical. It has a total of 4 full-time employees and l partime
